mapper.sql: SELECT p.paymentCode ,p.paymentRsvCode ,p.paymentRefund ,p.paymentUseMoney ,p.paymentStatus ,r.rsvEndDateTime ,r.rsvState FROM tbPayment as p INNER JOIN tbRsv AS r ON p.paymentRsvCode = r.rsvCode
mapper.select: WHERE r.rsvEndDateTime >= '2020-12-28' AND r.rsvEndDateTime < '2021-01-01' AND p.paymentStoreCode = '5' AND p.paymentStatus = 'N'
